results.name: Smallest prime > n!.
link: Hugo Pfoertner, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..450
mathematica: PrimeNext[n_]:=Module[{k},k=n+1;While[ !PrimeQ[k],k++ ];k]; Table[PrimeNext[n! ],{n,40}] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, May 30 2010 *)
results.author: _Jud McCranie_
